PHRASE.LANG: Developed and manufactured by the D2O Special Weapons Division. The D2O- APSC consists of a smoothbore steel tube, about 5 ft. (1.5 m) long, open at both ends and equipped with a hand grip, shoulder rest, trigger mechanism, sights long range enhanced vision array, and night vision capabilities. It was developed chiefly for attacking tanks and fortified positions at short range. The EOH Army favored this weapon during the Avalon Conflict for its ease of use and durability. Fitted to a specialized harness and personal armor vest, the D2O- APSC is only available as a special issue to CAS infantry anti-tank units. This weapon can only be fitted for male personnel.[#Legal]

Développé et fabriqué par la division des Armes spéciales de la D2O. Le D2O- APSC est composé d'un tube d'acier à canon lisse d'environ 1.5m de long, ouvert aux deux extrémités, et équipé d'une poignée, d'un appui pour l'épaule, d'un mécanisme de détente, d'un viseur à longue portée et d'une vision nocturne. Il a été principalement conçu pour attaquer les chars d'assaut et les positions fortifiées à courte portée. L'armée de l'EOH a choisi cette arme au cours de la bataille d'Avalon pour sa simplicité d'utilisation et sa longévité. Adapté à un harnais spécial et à une veste renforcée, le D2O-APSC n'est disponible que pour certains membres des unités d'infanterie antichar du CAS. Cette arme ne convient qu'aux agents hommes.[#Legal]

Developed and manufactured by the D2O Special Weapons Division. The D2O- APSC consists of a smoothbore steel tube, about 5 ft. (1.5 m) long, open at both ends and equipped with a hand grip, shoulder rest, trigger mechanism, sights long range enhanced vision array, and night vision capabilities. It was developed chiefly for attacking tanks and fortified positions at short range. The EOH Army favored this weapon during the Avalon Conflict for its ease of use and durability. Fitted to a specialized harness and personal armor vest, the D2O- APSC is only available as a special issue to CAS infantry anti-tank units. This weapon can only be fitted for male personnel.[#Legal]
